nodes.text: Vindi's shuttle was a Sheathipede-class transport shuttle was owned by Doctor Nuvo Vindi during the Clone Wars. It was later captured during a Galactic Republic raid on Nuvo Vindi's laboratory, in which Jedi Generals Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi used the shuttle to transport Vindi to Naboo's capital, Theed, for trial.
